long_description: The 686 Mannual Heather insulated jacket for girls rocks the mountain or the neighborhood sled hill with bold, stripe-happy style, cozy warmth and waterproof, breathable protection. Durable polyester shell with INFIDRY-5(TM) waterproof, breathable coating and taped critical seams offers great weather protection. Polyester insulation traps heat for cozy warmth all day long; it insulates even when damp. Youth Evolution sleeves extend 1.5 in. to keep up with your child's growth for the next season. Attached hood; front stormflap; soft chin guard; handwarmer pockets; adjustable powder skirt; rip-and-stick cuffs.
short_description: The 686 Mannual Heather insulated jacket for girls rocks the mountain or the neighborhood sled hill with bold, stripe-happy style, cozy warmth and waterproof, breathable protection.
